## Entity.hasType() method

Validate if a Component type exists on this Entity.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
hasType(type: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | string | Component type to validate if it exists on this Entity. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if the Component type exists on this Entity.
